modifications: Added IsValid() method for MeasurementMode enum

patterns_discovered: Validation method pattern using pointer receiver
Specific error handling with ValidationError type
Allowing empty/default values with explicit checks
gotchas_discovered: MeasurementMode validation only runs if mode is explicitly set

recommendations: Consider adding more comprehensive validation checks
Document the default behavior for empty MeasurementMode
Add unit tests to cover different validation scenarios
